description: Episode number 1 of Series "Colour of war". Volume 1 of this three-part series that combines previously unseen colour footage of World War II with the recollections of those involved begins during the pre-war turmoil of 1930's when the rhetoric of ideology and extremism was increasingly being heard. Highlights include combat footage of the Spanish Civil War, the coronation of King George VI in 1937, spectacular mass rallies in Germany and the Soviet Union and the images of the devastation of the Blitz in Great Britain. Narrated by John Thaw. Also available on DVD [318999].
